clause_text: . However, in cases where non-slum/non cessed plot is amalgamated with the slum/cessed plot for the purpose of better planning etc. then DRC will be receivable on the non-slum plot/ non-cessed plot. In such cases utilization of DRC shall be governed as per procedure and provisions stipulated in this Regulation and sub clause (B).
section: .1 Utilization of Transferable Development Rights (TDR ) and Road Width Relation will be govern by regulation 30 (A) subject to following notes:-
